column1: Do you prefer a structured or flexible work environment?
column2: Are you more comfortable with a formal or casual work atmosphere?
column3: How do you prefer to collaborate with colleagues?
column4: Are you more productive when working independently or as part of a team?
column5: Do you prefer a hands-on, directive management style, or do you prefer more autonomy and freedom?
column6: How do you respond to feedback and guidance from supervisors?
column7: How important is work-life balance to you, and what initiatives or policies do you appreciate in this regard?
column8: What values do you prioritize in a workplace?
column9: How important is it for you to work for a company that aligns with your personal values and beliefs?
column10: What are your expectations regarding career development opportunities within a company?
column11: How do you respond to constructive feedback, and what type of feedback culture do you thrive in?
column12: How do you prefer to celebrate successes and achievements in the workplace?
